website_summaries.verdict: Mid-range quality. Better than cheaper models but not quite the level of the more expensive ones.
pros: Firm and comfortable with fantastic headrest
cons: Not quite as comfortable as more expensive tables

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, comfortable table
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it for more than a couple weeks, however I am so far very impressed with this table. It is sturdy, with solid legs that feel like they easily support my weight. Clients have been very positive about the comfort of the table, and the thickness of the padding. It's portable and fits in my small car, albeit tightly. I would recommend to zip the cover to the edge of the handles of the table itself and use them to help lift it instead of using the shoulder strap on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Little

customer_reviews.title: I ordered it in purple and it is beautiful. It is light weight
customer_reviews.text: This portable massage table is extremely well made using the highest quality materials. I ordered it in purple and it is beautiful. It is light weight, easy to carry and set up, and the cushion is so comfortable that almost all of my clients fall asleep on the table. I especially recommend it for Reiki practitioners because it's ends are open ended and when sitting on a stool you can work without any obstructions. This table is an excellent table especially for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table for Student/New Practitioner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for students or new practitioners. It’s the perfect standard width (30”)- a twin sheet fits it perfectly. It’s about 35 lbs so it’s portable and not too heavy. Super easy to unbox and set up. I’m 6’3” and adjusting the table height was very easy. It’s very comfortable and doesn’t wobble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Galen M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table good price.
customer_reviews.text: Shopped and shopped for a good basic massage table and settled on this one. It seems well-built, is easy to put up and fold away. Solid and steady during massage sessions. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arrow

customer_reviews.title: Worth all your pennies.
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this table. I do 3-5 massages on it weekly and all of my clients noticed the difference between my old one and this one. They said it was comfy, super soft(it has more cushion) and it was wide enough for stretches(while still fitting in their homes). I went with the blue table and it’s gorgeous. It fits my regular size massage sheets and the open ends allows room for my knees when I’m working on the neck or feet. Seriously worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these tables and needed several more. I have had this exact table for over four years and still holding strong! Will purchase again and again
customer_reviews.author: Madison Meek

customer_reviews.title: Value is great with Color, Light weight, and Comfortable plush cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Searched for a few weeks looking for my first Reiki table from high priced massage tables to possibly starting with a lower priced massage table just to get me started; then came this Gem landing perfect from value to price point. Just unwrapped it and loving the purple color with the soft durable plush cushioning. Easy to set up and easy to carry with the straps or the included bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very quality purchased
customer_reviews.text: I received my table yesterday it was a day early the color is purple it’s absolutely lovely the material is high-quality the thickness is exactly the way the table was described I would recommend this to anyone who needs to use this at work or for Home whether it’s a daily use or every now and then this is the best purchase I have made and I have bought two tables before this one is totally worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dan Horstmann

customer_reviews.title: Reiki Table
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful table the quality is very good. The color purple was very nice. Well worth the money. It is very comfortable. It is a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Great Massage Table for Professionals or Personal Use
customer_reviews.text: I work for a Chiropractor and she gave me a $200.00 budget to replace the ten year old table we had. Always having Oakworks or Earthlite tables which cost at least twice that I felt I couldn't find a table to live up to those. Not sure how I came across this one ... but it is made by Earthlite. It has an adjustable headrest, open ends to sit and work comfortably at neck and feet. I am impressed with the density and comfort of the foam. The table is also very sturdy. Of course it is new and hopefully will have many years of service. With Amazon Prime free shipping it was UNDER $200.00 and delivered in a day!
customer_reviews.author: deb m obrien

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Table seems to be very sturdy. The padding is thick enough to be comfortable. I am happy with the warranty on this table. A friend who is a reiki practitioner recommended this table to me, and I believe it will fit my needs well.
customer_reviews.author: JennW.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent massage table. Very comfortable easy to set up. I don’t travel with my table, so can’t say anything about the travel bag or this being a light weight table. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Resa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Inner Strength E2 massage table
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this table!!! It is structurally well made, the purple leather is beautiful and soft, and the table is cushioned & super comfortable to lie on. Delivered on time - extremely happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: highly recomended
customer_reviews.text: I am a new Esthetician's/ Laser Tech in search to one day openinng my own pratice, i have worked with plenty of beds in the business and earthlite seems to be the go to. amazing beds can start at $600 or so. Lets just say this bed takes the cake im extremely happy with the product and price wonderful company package great my husband is a big guy and he fits great with lots of room easily can treat a athletic built person on this beds with comfort will order again.
customer_reviews.author: latishann

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and more padding than my old Earth Lite table that I paid $400 for. The vinyl seems to be more durable and it is easier to sit on the end with the open legs. I was afraid it might not be as strong with the open ends but it very stable.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent massage table. I've been using it for a little more than a year and I haven't experienced any issues with it. The padding is a bit firm, firmer than I'd like, and the vinyl isn't the softer stuff I thought it was.. but it's still a good table. I often use a heating pad with a soft cover over it, and that makes it plenty soft. It's heavy, as all tables are, but I think it's on the lighter end. I'm 5'0 tall, and while toting it around isn't *easy* it's certainly doable (just not too fun). Nice table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my reiki practice and I couldn't be happier. Excellent quality for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this massage table! It's so plush and sturdy for such a great price. The headrest is so comfortable. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CEO

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a table that was three years old before I purchased this one. I was so surprised how comfortable this new bed is with the cushion. It looks nice and is also very sturdy. I'm very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: K. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but too heavy for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table and very comfortable. However, too heavy for me to take on location
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy enough for a big 260lb guy
customer_reviews.text: The table is solid, sturdy enough for a big 260lb guy. Easy to put up and take down even for a young esthetician woman. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  table !
customer_reviews.text: I have a massage practice and have had this table for a few months and I am extremely happy with it. Sturdy, easy to clean and very comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Actually sturdy and amazing And sooo easy to put together and carry
customer_reviews.author: melisa Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Table works great! We use these ones in class and I find that the foam density is great and the face cradle feels nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: keeho

customer_reviews.title: Nice table. Easy to set up and not too ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. Easy to set up and not too heavy. Comfortable. Quality good for price. This is my first massage table and I am pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mindful Social Worker

customer_reviews.title: Table has held up really well and clients like it. A bit heavy if you plan to ...
customer_reviews.text: Table has held up really well and clients like it. A bit heavy if you plan to carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Santamaria

customer_reviews.title: Good table. Pretty much just the same table as ...
customer_reviews.text: Good table. Pretty much just the same table as all the Earth light tables just cheaper. It is a little more stiff feeling than the others but a good solid table. The only con is that the carrying case isnt all that comfortable to wear. The shoulder strap just isnt that great. But its an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money. Researching this, it appears that Inner Strength is made by Earthlite. Very sturdy, I do agree though with one of the reviews about the head rest, the handles are plastic - very strong plastic but still plastic, so be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Bayou

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know a lot about massage tables, but did some research and seemed this was the most bang for the buck! Wanted something at home so I can give my wife massages (as a birthday present) and she has not complained. Table is sturdy... Padding is comfortable... Table is easy to put away... Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: jgomez21

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke at base of wood leg a couple months after receiving it but too late to return. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Response to my Complaint
customer_reviews.text: This table seems ok. What disturbed me was the carrycase. It smelled so bad, I couldn't keep it in my house, let alone put the table inside it. I complained to the seller and they told me they would contact Earthlite, where this table and accessories came from. I never heard a thing back from anyone. I have been trying to get the horrible smell out of the case ever since. I know it isn't normal because I know folks who have these tables, and had no problem with bad odors from the carrying cases.
customer_reviews.author: tjkinhi

customer_reviews.title: QUESTION: Will these portable tables fit in compact cars ...
customer_reviews.text: QUESTION: Will these portable tables fit in compact cars (Prius C, Ford Fiesta, Honda Civic, etc? Or how large a vehicle do I need to load, unload and get it all the way in? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: INNER STRENGTH Portable Massage Table Package E2 - Full Reiki Massage Table Incl. Deluxe Adjustable Face Cradle, Pillow & Carry Case (30"x73")
product_meta.description:
The INNER STRENGTH E2 Massage Table is an ideal choice for new and seasoned massage therapists and accommodates a variety of massage modalities. The E2 was crafted using managed-forest birch hardwood and finished with natural, water based lacquer. Quality workmanship and a patented aircraft-grade cabling system ensure strength and durability while a luxurious 3" cushioning system offers extraordinary comfort.

E2 Table Features:

 * Full Size Table, 30" x 73"
 * Luxurious 100% PU Vinyl
 * Triple wrap, 3" cushioning system
 * Patented Cradle Lock cabling system. Full length piano hinge for extra strength and stability.
 * Stable Reiki endplates, Shiatsu Release Cables
 * 5 year limited warranty on frame. 1 year on foam/vinyl
 * Value Package includes deluxe adjustable headrest, cushion, and single pocket carry case.
 * Passes 400 lbs drop test, 600lbs working weight
feature_bullets: COMPLETE PORTABLE MASSAGE TABLE: Full sized, 30” x 73” quality hardwood frame with Reiki endplates. Weighs 32b. Height range: 23” to 33”
PORTABLE: Easy to transport, foldable with full length piano hinge. Includes Single Pocket Carry Case
SUPREME COMFORT: Triple layer, 3” Cushioning System. 100% PU upholstery
STRONG: 600lb working weight. Static weight tested: 2400 lbs
INNER STRENGTH: US based manufacturer seeking to deliver high quality affordable massage tables. 5 year warranty

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
